channel.title: [PI] PvP Drops Help REP++ For Help!

item.title: [PI] PvP Drops Help REP++ For Help!
item.dc:creator: @aquikzebra aquikzebra
item.description:
@aquikzebra wrote:

Hey Everyone,

I recently added this code to my playassistant.java

int random2 = Misc.random(20); int randomz2 = Misc.random(5); if(random2 == 10) { if (randomz2 == 0) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 14876, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.killerId); c.sendMessage("<col=990>Congratulations! you recieved a PvP artifact drop! Talk to the sin seer at home!"); } if (randomz2 == 1)//demise { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 14877, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.killerId); c.sendMessage("<col=990>Congratulations! you recieved a PvP artifact drop! Talk to the sin seer at home!"); } if (randomz2 == 2) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 14878, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.killerId); c.sendMessage("<col=990>Congratulations! you recieved a PvP artifact drop! Talk to the sin seer at home!"); } if (randomz2 == 3) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 14879, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.killerId); c.sendMessage("<col=990>Congratulations! you recieved a PvP artifact drop! Talk to the sin seer at home!"); } if (randomz2 == 4) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 14880, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.killerId); c.sendMessage("<col=990>Congratulations! you recieved a PvP artifact drop! Talk to the sin seer at home!"); } if (randomz2 == 5) { Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, 14881, c.getX(), c.getY(), 1, c.killerId); c.sendMessage("<col=990>Congratulations! you recieved a PvP artifact drop! Talk to the sin seer at home!"); } }

Everything worked perfectly except for the fact that the dialogue goes to the person who got killed, instead of the person getting the killâ€¦ Uhm, what do I do?

Thanks
